name: Last Minute Taxes
description:
Oh no! You've waited until the (literal) last minute to do your taxes! Again!

Can you finish your taxes on time while having to deal with the stress that comes with it? Having to see each of your precious seconds ticking down until the IRS comes to arrest you? Find out in Last Minute Taxes!

This is the result of a prompt to work on for two weeks by the Game Development Club at my college, and also marks the first project I've ever released.

The .zip file below contains the files and executable for the game, as well as the .mp3 of the song I made for the game. Just unzip it after downloading and you should be gucci.
